about_the_game:
HANK CHAO of THE MISTER FISTER FIELDS, BMERICA decides to partake on a maaaaaaaaaagical journey known as THE BAULAQUEST to defeat the dastardly MISTER ROBINSON, SAVE THE WORLD, and DISCOVER HIS FULL POTENTIAL.

git gud and join today.

please

please.

Features:

  • Top-down bullet hell / twin stick shooter gameplay
  • Dubious digital graphics made by yours truly
  • Original music also made by me (very handsome)
  • Many levels, enemies, bosses, and secrets 0_0
  • Mac and Cheese
  • Several neat characters - friendly, unfriendly, and sometimes-friendly-but-also-maybe-not(?)
  • DANK lore and story
  • Cat people
  • Challenging gameplay, tough but fair (except when it's not)
  • lol



** DISCLAIMER: This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, business, events and incidents are the products of the author’s imagination. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux kernel 5.x or higher
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6600K CPU @ 3.50GHz (4 CPUs) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything with Vulkan support or equivalent
  • Storage: 42069 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything that plays sound good
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux kernel 6.x or higher
  • Sound Card: Anything that plays sound... great :)
  • Additional Notes: I use arch btw

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 13.x, I guess? (Yeah I don't use macOS, sorry)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6600K CPU @ 3.50GHz (4 CPUs) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything with Vulkan support or equivalent
  • Sound Card: Anything that plays sound
  • Additional Notes: lmao

name: BaulaQuest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6600K CPU @ 3.50GHz (4 CPUs) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything with DX12 support or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 42069 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything that plays sound good
  • Additional Notes: This game is native to Linux, so sorry if there's a Windows-specific bug or bugs at some point.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 x64, probably
  • Sound Card: Anything that plays sound gooder
  • Additional Notes: lol

short_description: Local middle school teacher fights angry orange bald man army with marbles and furry creatures. Baula. Quest. BaulaQuest.
